# kCGImagePropertyOpenEXRAspectRatio

**Global Variable**

The aspect ratio of the image.

## Declaration

```swift
let kCGImagePropertyOpenEXRAspectRatio: CFString
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFNumber].

## Open EXR Properties

- **kCGImagePropertyOpenEXRDictionary**: A dictionary of properties specific to the OpenEXR metadata standard.
